about_the_game:
Letterlike is a roguelike word game that's all about collecting items, upgrading words, and upgrading letter tiles to make the strongest synergies and reach the highest scores! 

Originally released on mobile, the anticipated port of the hit word roguelike is here! Players on mobile love Letterlike! 

  • 4.8 of 5 Stars on the App and Google Play Stores with over a hundred reviews across both platforms! 

  • Held the #1 Spot for the Top Paid Word Games in the Google Play Store for numerous weeks!

  • Held the #2 Spot for the Top Paid Word Games in the App Store for numerous weeks!

MAKE WORDS, SCORE POINTS

Start with a bag of letters to create an endless number of words of varying lengths! Collect items to create powerful synergies and new builds along the way. Upgrade words and letters to beat the boss at the end of each level - but be careful. Some of their abilities bite back hard! You're going to have to make the right upgrades to claim victory! 

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES

A definitive word game and roguelike experience with endless possibilities through procedurally generated letters, items, and bosses. 

UNLOCK BAGS AND DIFFICULTIES

Advance through multiple bags and difficulties for hours and hours of content

PROGRESSIVE UPGRADES

Collect gems for powerful upgrades to achieve the highest score anyone has ever seen! Venture into New Game + to truly test your greatest builds! 

SYNERGIZE

Claim victory with a variety a different tools - upgrade your words, upgrade your letters, or collect the right items.  Use these special powers to make a splash!

  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
